    Door, DoorAgentDraw, Molecule

    Author:
    Martín Pérez Pérez

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Agent getExterior()
      This function return the agent that works like a door inside a layer

      This function get the door radius of action in inside the layer

      This function return the id of layer where is the inside door
